title: Mummy Bandage, Wen-nefer, born of Ta-amun
dimensions:
2 9/16 x 16 1/8 in. (6.5 x 41 cm)

section: Preparing for and Sending to the Afterlife

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

completeness.name: Best
completeness.description: All data has been vetted. Objects generally have quality photos and descriptions.

labels.title: 37.2039.81E
labels.content: The spells on this bandage concern the Opening of the Mouth ritual, which was meant magically to restore the deceased’s ability to breathe, eat, drink, and function in the afterlife.

collections.name: Egyptian, Classical, Ancient Near Eastern Art
